1.text: Choose a tender cut of steak.

2.text: Let the steak come to room temperature.

3.text: Place a cast iron skillet in the oven and turn on the broiler.

4.text: Season or marinate the steak as desired.

5.text: Remove the skillet from the oven and place the steak in it.

6.text: Sear the steak for 3 minutes on each side.

8.text: Cook the steak for 1-5 minutes if you like it rare.

9.text: Cook the steak for 2-7 minutes if you like it medium.

10.text: Cook the steak for 4-9 minutes if you like it medium-well.

11.text: Let the steak rest for 3-10 minutes.

12.text: Cut the steak diagonally, if desired.

13.text: Serve the steak on warm plates.
